title: Getty Images stereotypes
research_question: Which visual tropes emerge in connection to different pollution routes, practices and substances?
description: GettyImages provides insight into the visual repertoire associated with toxicities. This page shows images returned by GettyImages for each query. Images are grouped into clusters of stereotypes. Clusters of stereotypes are ordered alphabetically.
protocol: Collect top 1000 images per search term using a custom script
Cluster images in each dataset based on formal similarity
Identify most recurrent visual stereotypes and name each cluster
